title: Guess what guys.
body:
Ahri is getting a KDA Prestige skin now.

After all the backlash Prestige Blood Moon Aatrox had, why would you release another $100 skin?

replies.body: The best part is that it looks terrible.
The bigger question is, why would someone buy a $100 skin?

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Dienekes,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5eHEv060,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-20T18:54:50.813+0000)
>
> The bigger question is, why would someone buy a $100 skin?

The even bigger question is, why do people keep buying it?
As long as there's a moron to buy them they will keep producing them

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Dienekes,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5eHEv060,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-20T18:54:50.813+0000)
>
> The bigger question is, why would someone buy a $100 skin?

Exactly. Plus it looks terrible.

It really does. I thought Prestige Ahri was one they'd really try hard to impress with but it's been a huge disappointment. That hair...ugh.

Also the piss colors.
Well no surprise since they announced it like months ago.
As someone with the other 2 KDA prestige skins, I'm not buying this with that method.
It was already announced that everyone from KDA will get a prestige version
